actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chafee. With written report No. 98-90.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 145.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 2395 as an amendment.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 2395 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original bill to extend until October 1, 1985, the authority for advances to the migratory bird conservation fund.

summary.text: (Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H. R. 2395 passed in lieu) Amends the Wetlands Loan Extension Act of 1976 to extend through FY 1984 the authorization of appropriations to promote the conservation of migratory waterfowl and to offset or prevent the serious loss of important wetlands and other waterfowl habitat. Changes to October 1, 1984, the date on which repayments from the migratory bird conservation fund to the Treasury are to begin (except under specified circumstances).

titles.title: An original bill to extend until October 1, 1985, the authority for advances to the migratory bird conservation fund.
